Name: Follow The Cat
About the game: GAME Follow The Cat is a first-person puzzle game based on manipulating shape and physics of 'Magnetic Cube'. You make your path with using special glove through story with mysterious cat. STORY In the extraordinary evaluation process of the company to hire new employees. An unexpected guest will accompany you. Experience an unusual job interview method and unravel the mystery of the guest. DESIGN Visually designed spaces to enrich experience and story.
